es.ugr.swad.swadroid.gui

Interface SwipeListViewTouchListener.OnSwipeCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    SwipeListViewTouchListener

    public static interface SwipeListViewTouchListener.OnSwipeCallback
    The callback interface used by SwipeListViewTouchListener to inform its client about a successful swipe of one or more list item positions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStartSwipe()
      Called when the user begins to swipe the list item.
      void onStopSwipe()
      Called when the user stops to swipe the list item.
      void onSwipeLeft(ListView listView, int[] reverseSortedPositions)
      Called when the user has swiped the list item to the left.
      void onSwipeRight(ListView listView, int[] reverseSortedPositions)
      Called when the user has swiped the list item to the right.

    • Method Detail

      • onSwipeLeft

        void onSwipeLeft(ListView listView,
               int[] reverseSortedPositions)
        Called when the user has swiped the list item to the left.
        Parameters:
        listView - The originating ListView.
        reverseSortedPositions - An array of positions to dismiss, sorted in descending order for convenience.

      • onSwipeRight

        void onSwipeRight(ListView listView,
                int[] reverseSortedPositions)
        Called when the user has swiped the list item to the right.
        Parameters:
        listView - The originating ListView.
        reverseSortedPositions - An array of positions to dismiss, sorted in descending order for convenience.

      • onStartSwipe

        void onStartSwipe()
        Called when the user begins to swipe the list item.

      • onStopSwipe

        void onStopSwipe()
        Called when the user stops to swipe the list item.
